FIRST_SECTION.title: Mastercraft Bamboo Monitor Riser
FIRST_SECTION.description: A beautiful & handcrafted monitor stand to reduce neck and eye strain.

THIRD_SECTION.title: About this project
THIRD_SECTION.description: The Mastercraft Bamboo Monitor Riser is a sturdy and stylish platform that elevates your screen to a more comfortable viewing height. Placing your monitor at eye level has the potential to improve your posture and make you more comfortable while at work, helping you stay focused on the task at hand. The Mastercraft Bamboo Monitor Riser is crafted from sustainable bamboo, a durable and strong material that is also environmentally friendly. The riser is designed to support a monitor, laptop, TV, or printer up to 200 pounds. The riser is 20 inches wide, 10 inches deep, and 5.5 inches tall, providing plenty of space for your device and any accessories you may need. The riser also features a built-in drawer for storing small items, such as pens, paper clips, or sticky notes. The drawer is 18 inches wide, 8 inches deep, and 1.5 inches tall, providing ample storage space for your desk essentials. The riser is finished with a clear, water-based finish that highlights the natural beauty of the bamboo.
